description: The scene depicts a man with a bicycle peering into one of several large, open circular holes in the ground, situated within a fenced area featuring a guard tower and a small rocket. This arrangement creates an absurd and surreal environment for the seemingly simple act of looking down a hole. The presence of security elements like the fence and tower, alongside the rocket, adds a layer of dark humor and potential danger to the mundane action. The overall image combines disparate elements to form an ironic commentary on caution in bizarre circumstances.
caption: Never, never do this.
